column4: on what device would you normally expect the DVD drive to show up?
/dev/dvd doesn’t appear to have anything sensible at it
any ideas on how I can debug where the device actually is?
the drive deffinately thinks nothing’s in there – no medium found
i guess reloading won't change anything?
nope, tried a second disk now, and it does the same – I’m thinking the same as Samus_Aran here – buggered drive
drives are cheap, support manufacturer of your choice then :)
yep, not sure it’s worth it with this laptop – it’s just a temporary measure until we can afford a MacBook for my wife
wait… grep is showing lines that vim says aren't in the file
